name: wepback-vsts-extension
description: webpack Visual Studio Team System (VSTS) Extension

scripts.setup-samples: yarn run setup-sample-one && yarn run setup-sample-two && yarn run setup-sample-webpack2 && yarn run setup-sample-webpack3 && yarn run setup-sample-webpack3-with-issues && yarn run setup-sample-webpack-ts-config && yarn run setup-sample-webpack-4
scripts.setup: yarn run setup-samples && yarn && cd tasks/webpack-build-task && yarn
scripts.build: yarn run setup && yarn run build-without-setup
scripts.update-version-without-setup: yarn run build-without-setup && yarn run update-version
scripts.release: yarn run build && yarn run update-version && node node_modules/tfx-cli/_build/tfx-cli.js extension create --manifest-glob vss-extension.json --output-path ./dist/webpack-vsts-extension.vsix
scripts.test-reporter: cd tasks/webpack-build-task && mocha tests/integrationTests/suite.js tests/messageParserTests/index.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test-results.xml
scripts.test: yarn run build-without-setup && cd tasks/webpack-build-task && mocha tests/integrationTests/suite.js tests/messageParserTests/index.js

author: Dealogic
